@devnetsecops @MattRedhawk No one is getting emotional at all. This is just a discussion to try and get to an understanding. I 100% agree with you if we are talking about negotiation. I was talking about just in general but to your point, yes never take anyone's advice at face value in a negotiation

@devnetsecops @MattRedhawk Do you expect that folks on the other side of the table are just liars? You must not follow enough honest and helpful VCs. I frequently give founders advice that isn't advantageous to me as an investor because its better to be honest and that's how you build real trust

RT @PaigeBolinger: @MacConwell Also, this is blatant bad faith. Yes parties sign them but term sheets are non-binding from a legal perspectâ€¦

@jason_pontin @WillManidis True but many new founders come to places like Twitter to learn. Jokes like this are obvious to you and me but what about a first-time founder who's just getting started. They wouldn't know the difference. They may barely know what a term sheet is. that's why I posted what I did.
